about_the_game:
Enter a beautiful world of adventure and intrigue. With the light and prosperity of his Kingdom gone, the King has no choice but to marry his daughter to a mysterious stranger in order to save his realm.
Desperate to save herself from eternal misery, Princess writes to the amazing Munchausen to come back to the Kingdom, defeat the villainous stranger and save the day! In this excellent combination of hidden object & adventure game play follow the would famous Munchausen as he unwraps the mystery of the evil stranger and brings peace and prosperity back to the Kingdom.

- Exciting combination of hidden object and adventure game play
- Dozens of unique mini-games
- Challenging brain-teasers
- Clever association-based hidden object game play

About the Game

Enter a beautiful world of adventure and intrigue. With the light and prosperity of his Kingdom gone, the King has no choice but to marry his daughter to a mysterious stranger in order to save his realm.
Desperate to save herself from eternal misery, Princess writes to the amazing Munchausen to come back to the Kingdom, defeat the villainous stranger and save the day! In this excellent combination of hidden object & adventure game play follow the would famous Munchausen as he unwraps the mystery of the evil stranger and brings peace and prosperity back to the Kingdom.
